com.commercetools.sunrise.hooks

Interface Hook

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CartQueryFilterHook, CartUpdateCommandFilterHook, OrderByIdGetFilterHook, OrderQueryFilterHook, PageDataHook, PrimaryCartLoadedHook, PrimaryCartUpdateAsyncFilter, PrimaryCartUpdatedHook, ProductProjectionPagedSearchResultHook, ProductProjectionQueryFilterHook, ProductProjectionSearchFilterHook, QueryFilterHook<T>, RequestHook, SingleCategoryHook, SingleOrderHook, SingleProductProjectionHook, SingleProductVariantHook
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckoutCommonComponent, CheckoutStepWidgetComponent, DefaultPageNavMenuControllerComponent, FacetedSearchComponent, HomeProductSuggestionsControllerComponent, LocationSelectorControllerComponent, MiniCartControllerComponent, PaginationComponent, ProductSuggestionsControllerComponent, SearchBoxComponent, SortSelectorComponent

    public interface Hook
    Hooks are called by controllers to enable components to add behaviour to controllers. The method of the hook should be global unique so two hook interfaces never clash.
